data.actual_result: In-app notification is not at the top of the screen
data.expected_result: In-app notification should be at the top of the screen
data.short_description: In-app notifications aren't at the top of the screen on specific devices
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have in-app notifications enabled and are on online - Have someone mention you or DM you - Observe the spacing between the notification and the top of the screen
